column4:
['Na na na na na na…aise na karna', '
Narzein utha ke zara round ghoom ja', '
Lalalalaala start us stamp ka', '
Thodi si setting karke ruk tu ja', '
Thoda sa dekhe ke, thoda pasand mein', '
Phir thoda aaju baaju fielding ko to dekh le', '
Kar thoda round fix phir thoda down pitch', '
Phir pura zor lage ke maare six six six ..', '
Cha cha cha chain kuli ki chain kuli ki', '
Ma ma ma ma…mein kuli ki mein kuli', '
Cha cha cha chain kuli ki chain kuli ki', '
Ma ma ma ma…mein kuli ki mein kuli', '
Chain kuli ki ki mein kuli ki,', '
Mein kuli ki chain kuli ki', '
Chain kuli ki ki mein kuli ki,', '
Cha cha cha aah', 'Tu tu tu tu….pehle se soch le', '
Jo bhi opportunity aayega dabochle', '
Yun yun yun yun yun fielding toh set kar', '
Dekh usko aise batsman jaaye darr', '
Outstump uthaakar aur kabhi', '
Aur kabhi inswing outswing', '
Karke usako cofuse tu kar', '
Balling tu aise karke ho jaaye agala', '
Cha cha cha chain kuli ki chain kuli ki', '
Ma ma ma ma…mein kuli ki mein kuli', '
Cha cha cha chain kuli ki chain kuli ki', '
Ma ma ma ma…mein kuli ki mein kuli', '
Chain kuli ki ki mein kuli ki,', '
Mein kuli ki chain kuli ki', '
Chain kuli ki ki mein kuli ki,', '
Cha cha cha aah', 'Cha cha cha chain kuli ki chain kuli ki', '
Ma ma ma ma…mein kuli ki mein kuli', '
Now put your hands in the air,', '
Hands in the air, up up up in the air', '
Thoda sa dekhe ke, thoda pasand mein', '
Phir thoda aaju baaju fielding ko to dekh le', '
Kar thoda round fix phir thoda down pitch', '
Tu pura zor lage ke maarde six six six ..', '
Cha cha cha chain kuli ki chain kuli ki', '
Ma ma ma ma…mein kuli ki mein kuli', '
Cha cha cha chain kuli ki chain kuli ki', '
Ma ma ma ma…mein kuli ki mein kuli', '
Chain kuli ki ki mein kuli ki,', '
Mein kuli ki chain kuli ki', '
Chain kuli ki ki mein kuli ki,', '
Cha cha cha aah', '
Now put your hands in the air,', '
Hands in the air, up up up in the air', '
Hands in the air, hands in the air,', '
Up up up in the air.']
